refnamediv.refpurpose: scan and decode bar codes from a video stream

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: zebracam scans a video4linux video source (eg, a webcam) for bar codes and prints any decoded data to the standard output. The video stream is also displayed to the screen with the scan pattern overlay

refsection.title: Options
refsection.para: This program follows the usual GNU command line syntax, with long options starting with two dashes (`-'). A summary of options is included below
